item.title: Database Reliability Engineering - My Notes
item.description: Introduction I have been reading excellent Database Reliability Engineering book and below are my notes from it. Key Incentive(s) for Automation Elimination of Toil - Toil is the kind of work tied to running a production service that tends to be manual, repetitive, automatable, tactical, devoid of enduring value, and that scales linearly as a service grows. Important System Characteristics Latency, also known as response time, is a time-based measurement indicating how long it takes to receive a response from a request.
